item.title: Minnesota State High School Boys Hockey Predictions (Post Hoc Analysis)
item.description: In two previous posts, post 1 and post 2, I used Monte Carlo simulation to predict the winner of the 2018 Minnesota State High School Boys Hockey tournament. Now that the tournament is over, I wanted to analyze how the model did and also think about ways to improve the predictions should I want to re-run such a simulation in the future. Accuracy of the Predictions So, how well did the simulation do in predicting the state tournament champion?
